item.title: backend-menu
item.dc:creator: amit

item.title: layout
item.content:encoded:
[loop.@a apps] [aw2.set template.app='{@a.item.path}/' /] [template.get app set='template.apps.{@a.key}' /] [/loop.@a] [this_collection.backend-js /] [this_collection.backend-css /]
[if.not_empty settings.backend-logo] [/if.not_empty] [if.else] [wp.get option.blogname /] [/if.else]
[this_collection.side-bar-menu menu='{module.menu}'/]
[app.run active_module /]
[if.not_empty app.page_title] [/if.not_empty]

item.title: backend-js
backend-css
side-bar-menu
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] //**Template Menus of array**// [core.backend-menu o.set="template.menus" c.empty='{module.menu}'/] [module.menu o.set="template.menus" c.not_empty='{module.menu}'/]
//**Search bar**//
//**Search output container**//
    [loop.@menu template.menus] [if.user_can_access link='{@menu.item.link}' o.set='template.user_allowed'/] [if.true template.user_allowed]
  • [if.not_empty @menu.item.icon] [/if.not_empty] [aw2.get @menu.item.title /] [if.not_empty @menu.item.child-nav]
      [loop.@submenu @menu.item.child-nav] [if.user_can_access link='{@submenu.item.link}' o.set='template.user_allowed'/] [do.@x c.true=template.user_allowed]
    • [aw2.get @submenu.item.title /]
      • [/do.@x] [/loop.@submenu]
    [/if.not_empty]
    • [/if.true] [/loop.@menu]
[/templates.add]

item.title: layout-one
item.dc:creator: dhiraj
item.content:encoded:
[css.style] .overflow-hidden{ overflow: hidden; } i.fa{ font-family: 'FontAwesome' !important; } [role="group-details"] header h3 { border-bottom: 3px solid #eee; margin-bottom: 20px; padding-bottom: 5px; } .module-wrapper { padding: 50px; } .SumoSelect { width: 100%; } .form-group { margin-bottom: 0.5rem; .col-md-4.text-right{ @media only screen and (max-width: 767px){ text-align: left !important; } } @media only screen and (max-width: 767px){ margin-bottom: 1rem; } } .form-group .flatpickr-wrapper { display: block; } html body { max-width: 100%; font-size: 15px; } .btn { font-size: 14px; padding: 9px 30px; min-height: auto; } .mobile-header{ position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; box-shadow: 0 4px 17px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.15); z-index: 999; } .form-group.has-error{ .help-block{ color: @brand-danger; } input, textarea,.SumoSelect>.CaptionCont{ border-color: @brand-danger } } .top-strip{ padding: 10px 50px; @media only screen and (max-width: 767px) { padding: 15px 25px; } } .user-details{ padding-right: 50px; .user-menu-icon{ position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; cursor: pointer; } ul.user-menus { list-style-type: none; position: absolute; right: 0; top: 100%; background: #fff; padding: 0; margin: 0; margin-top: 22px; min-width: 200px; box-shadow: 0px 3px 8px rgba(0,0,0, 0.3); z-index: 9999; display: none; li a { padding: 12px 15px; display: block; border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; font-weight: bold; } &:before { content: ''; position: absolute; right: 6px; top: -12px; width: 10px; border-bottom: 12px solid #fff; border-left: 12px solid transparent; border-right: 12px solid transparent; } } } .main-container>.row>.content-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; &:before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; left: -30px; width: 30px; height: 30px; background: #fff; } } .change-user-role { display: none; position: fixed; left: 0; top: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); z-index: 99999; overflow: auto; .close-change-role{ cursor: pointer; } } .sidebar-toggle { width: 35px; height: 35px; padding: 3px; } @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) { .desktop-logo-wrapper{ height: 102px; background: #fff; .desktop-logo{ max-height: 62px; max-width: 100%; } } .content-header{ position: -webkit-sticky; position: sticky; top: 0; z-index: 999; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 9px 15px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.05); -moz-box-shadow: 0 9px 15px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.05); box-shadow: 0 9px 15px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.05); } .side-menu-wrapper{ position: fixed; left: 0; top: 0; height: 100vh; z-index: 1000; overflow: hidden; overflow-y: auto; width: 300px; transition: width 0.3s ease-in-out; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 9px 15px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.05); -moz-box-shadow: 0 9px 15px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.05); box-shadow: 0 9px 15px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.05); &::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 7px; } &::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: #f1f1f1; } &::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: #888; } &::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover { background: #555; } .careers-img{ width:90px; transition: width 0.4s ease-in-out; } .topmenu{ white-space: nowrap; } } .content-wrapper{ max-width: ~"calc(100% - 300px)"; transition: max-width 0.3s ease-in-out; } .hide-menu{ .topmenu ul li.has-submenu .submenu.menu-open { display: none; } .side-menu-wrapper:hover .topmenu ul li.has-submenu .submenu.menu-open { display: block; } .side-menu-wrapper{ width: 80px; a{ opacity: 0; } &:hover{ width: 300px; a{ opacity: 1; } } } .content-wrapper{ max-width: ~"calc(100% - 80px)"; } } } @media only screen and (max-width: 991px) { .side-menu-wrapper{ width: 100%; white-space: nowrap; } .side-menus { display: none; position: fixed; top: 60px; left: 0; width: 100%; height: ~"calc(100vh - 60px)"; z-index: 999; overflow-y: auto; background-color: @brand-primary; } } [/css.style]
[if.not_empty settings.backend-logo] [/if.not_empty] [if.else] [wp.get option.blogname /] [/if.else]
[if.not_empty settings.backend-logo] [/if.not_empty] [if.else] [wp.get option.blogname /] [/if.else]
[this_collection.side-bar-menu-one menu='{module.menu}'/]

[aw2.get current_user.display_name /]

[app.run active_module /]

item.title: side-bar-menu-one
item.dc:creator: dhiraj
